Class FlightService

java.lang.Object
com.cbfacademy.frugalflyer.flights.flight.FlightService
@Service public class FlightService extends Object
Service class to manage flight objects

    • FlightService

      public FlightService(FlightRepository flightRepo, AirportRepository airportRepo, DestinationRepository destinationRepo)
      Constructor for FlightService.
      Parameters:
      flightRepo - the FlightRepository to be used for data persistence

  • Method Details

    • searchFlightsUsingArrivalAirport

      public List<Flight> searchFlightsUsingArrivalAirport(double maxBudget, String departureAirport, String arrivalAirport, LocalDate departureDate, Integer flexiDays) throws InvalidDateException, AirportNotFoundException, InvalidNumberException
      Retrieves flights, applying filters using given paramenters
      Parameters:
      maxBudget - Maximum cost of flight
      departureAirport - Airport that the flight will depart from
      arrivalAirport - Airport that the flight will arrive at
      departureDate - Date that the flight will depart from the departure airport
      flexiDays - Number of flexible days to be subtracted and added from the departure date to allow a range of departure dates
      Returns:
      List of flights that match the given search criteria
      Throws:
      InvalidDateException
      AirportNotFoundException
      InvalidNumberException

    • searchFlightsUsingClimateAndTags

      public List<Flight> searchFlightsUsingClimateAndTags(double maxBudget, String departureAirport, String climate, LocalDate departureDate, Integer flexiDays, String tag) throws InvalidDateException, InvalidNumberException, AirportNotFoundException, InvalidClimateStringException, InvalidTagStringException
      Retrieves flights, applying filters using given paramenters
      Parameters:
      maxBudget - Maximum cost of flight
      departureAirport - Airport that the flight will depart from
      climate - Climate of the destination that the flight will arrive at
      departureDate - Date that the flight will depart from the departure airport
      flexiDays - Number of flexible days to be subtracted and added from the departure date to allow a range of departure dates
      tag - Descriptive tag that describes the type of holiday desired
      Returns:
      List of flights that match the given search criteria
      Throws:
      InvalidDateException
      InvalidNumberException
      AirportNotFoundException
      InvalidClimateStringException
      InvalidTagStringException

    • findRandomFlight

      public Flight findRandomFlight(String departureAirport) throws AirportNotFoundException
      Finds a single random flight that leaves from the specified airport
      Parameters:
      departureAirport - Airport that the flight will depart from
      Returns:
      random flight
      Throws:
      AirportNotFoundException

    • findCheapFlightAnomalies

      public List<Flight> findCheapFlightAnomalies(String departureAirport, String arrivalAirport, double threshold) throws AirportNotFoundException, InvalidNumberException
      Finds flight price anomalies using the z-score method
      Parameters:
      departureAirport - IATA code of departure airport
      arrivalAirport - IATA code of arrival airport
      threshold - threshold to determine how high the zscore needs to be for a price to be classed as an anomaly
      Returns:
      list of flights with price anomalies
      Throws:
      AirportNotFoundException
      InvalidNumberException
